thread.section_title: Valiant Finance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Valiant Finance | valiant.finance
thread.title: Prisco Minichiello
thread.title_full: Valiant Finance reviewed by Prisco Minichiello

author: Prisco Minichiello
title: Prisco Minichiello
text: I had been shopping this unique cash flow unsecured lending scenario for my client, to the usual cash flow lenders. they all made an offer but fell well short of my clients objective. then I remembers Valiant Finance. I don't Know what Nicki Ghazi did or how she did it, but it was done in a timely and very professional manner, with an excellent outcome for my client. Valiant will be my first port of call from now on.
